title: I just lost LP on a remake.
body:
Got two games in a row where we had an AFK and had to remake. 

I lost LP on the second game. I am a solo que player.
Is this by design?

replies.body:
The leaver penalty from a remake will be given to anyone who is flagged as AFK at the time of a remake, and there are certain behaviors that will flag you as AFK even if you don't physically disconnect from the game. This includes just standing/running around in your base waiting for the remake. If you do this or anything similar, you will be flagged as AFK and receive the leaver penalty.

For more information, you can read this guide here: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/208754686--Remake-FAQ

Zombiemaster provided some great context on /remake, as well as a link to the guide that provides additional information.  It's important to continue participating in matches even if someone appears to have left.  You can't be certain that the other player won't return, or if the /remake vote would even pass.
If you were afk as well (took no damage / did not attack / did nothing while you waited to remake) then LeaverBuster will flag you afk as well and you will lose LP for it.
I did not know that, thank you.
